title: Minister of Foreign Affairs on official visit to Tunisia
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, will pay on Thursday an official visit to Tunisia, bearing a message from President of the Republic Abdelmadjid Tebboune to Tunisian President Kais Saied.

Mr Boukadoum will hold talks with his Tunisian counterpart Mr Othman Jerandi in which the fraternal and distinguished relations between the two brotherly peoples and countries will be reviewed, in addition to the consultations and coordination on regional and international issues.
